title: House of Doolittle 2016-2017 Monthly Desk Pad Calendar, Academic, Classic, 22 x 17" (HOD155-17)
features: July 2016 - August 2017 calendar, featuring 14 months for Easy planning
Full monthly view on each page, featuring 3" x 2.1" blocks allocated for each day
Each monthly calendar page contains a full 12-Month calendar at the top for longer term planning
The pages are stitched at the top with black Leatherette binding and matching reinforced corners for durability throughout the year and perforated pages for Easy removal
Printed with high quality soy-based inks on 100% post-consumer recycled paper which is FSC certified and made in the USA
description: Since 1919, House of Doolittle has manufactured quality dated products made in the United States that help you be more productive during your daily planning activities. Thirty years ago we made the commitment to produce all of our products using recycled paper and materials. This House of Doolittle 12 month desk pad calendar starts in July 2016 and goes through August 2017. It features a strong glue bound leatherette core at the top and includes two chipboard reinforced leatherette corners at the bottom to keep pages in place. Each page is perforated at the top for easy tear-off as needed. The desk pad calendar features Julian dates and days remaining, full year reference calendar on each page, and lightly ruled daily blocks. This desk pad calendar is perfect for any office desk, teacher's desk, student's desk or any other environment that calls for organization. Other products from House of Doolittle include desk pads, wall calendars, lesson planners, class record books, assignment books, monthly appointment planners and weekly appointment planners. Go Green with House of Doolittle products, as we use 100% recycled paper containing 100% post-consumer waste with soy-based inks. All of our products are manufactured in the USA and are FSC certified. Since 1989 House of Doolittle has donated 5% of its profits to organizations that are working to create a more sustainable environment.
